issue.title: [CF 1220] Bug UnitClass condition with warrior?
issue.body:
For some reason when I put arena1, arena2 or arena3 as unitID for the unit class Warrior condition, it always returns true and thus showing the icon.
I want a certain icon only to show when there is a warrior in arena1, arena2 or arena3. It only seems to happen with warriors, it's working for any other class.

^1^T^SType^Sbuff ^SName^SStealth ^SEnabled^B ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SCLASS2 ^SUnit^Sarena1 ^SBitFlags^N1 ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^t^N74003^S~`~| ^Sicon^^


> Posted by CurseForge user daniel1992 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1220 | Raw

comments.body:
Thanks for the report. Fixed in g1f5302c (for Legion).


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
